definition: overcast (weather)/cloudy/shady/Yin (the negative principle of Yin and Yang)/negative (electric.)/feminine/moon/implicit/hidden/genitalia

sentences.english: Yin soft voice as disappeared silently dollar voice interest.
sentences.chinese: 陰柔的聲音如石沉大海般悄元聲息。

sentences.english: "I Role Play, Therefore I Am" justifies skirt wearing in feminine role players.
sentences.chinese: 爲陰柔扮裝的人提供了穿裙裝的合理性。

sentences.english: The spirit of the custom is purity and simplicity, which manifests common customs of feminized culture.
sentences.chinese: 其總體精神是“淳和質樸”，是陰柔文化的世俗化。

sentences.english: Girls get fed up with the feminine nature of the men.
sentences.chinese: 女孩兒們更是受夠了那些陰柔的娘娘腔。

sentences.english: More feminine men tend to be better providers.
sentences.chinese: 面容陰柔的男性往往是兩性關係配偶的更佳選擇。

sentences.english: This essay expounds the theoretical connotation and sense of YAO Nai s strength and grace.
sentences.chinese: 本文闡述了姚鼐“陽剛陰柔”理論的內涵和意義。

definition: when things reach an extreme, they can only move in the opposite direction (idiom)
cultured and refined (idiom); gentle and cultivated
lucid and elegant/quiet and exquisite/clear and attractive style
